content: find the pattern here 1 celebrate the beauty of the garden with the **2026 collaborative crochet along blanket** this stunning mosaic crochet blanket brings together the talents of 10 amazing designers each contributing a unique motif inspired by plants and blooms that might be found in a british country garden from tulips to poppies and everything in between each section is a joy to crochet and a delight to display the pattern uses overlay mosaic crochet and whether you re an experienced crocheter or an advanced beginner the detailed written instructions clear charts and video tutorials will guide you every step of the way key features - 11 unique designer motifs forming a cohesive collaborative blanket - overlay mosaic crochet technique - written and graphical instructions inside the ebook 2 - free graphs 3 for each section - beginner-friendly video tutorials demonstrating the key techniques - adaptable size to suit your project - large print option - a supportive community to share your progress and stay inspired start your cal journey today and enjoy the calming rewarding process of creating a blanket full of colour life and charm one stitch at a time **please note that the yardage is based on a five-repeat wide single-sided blanket ** colour a cream - 3265m/3571 yds colour b green - apx 934m/1022 yds colour c pink - apx 542m/593 yds colour d purple - apx 531m/581 yds colour e yellow - apx 354m/388 yds yarn pack available via wool warehouse 4 final size before border apx 135 by 193cm/54 by 77 5 inches you may sell the blankets that you crochet by following this pattern on a small scale provided that you credit elimee designs as the pattern designer mass production is not permitted this pattern or any of its parts may not be altered reproduced distributed sold made into a video tutorial or translated without written permission from elimee designs copies can be made for personal use only please note that all pdf crochet patterns by elimee designs are non-refundable this pattern is only available in english if you would like any support whilst crocheting this pattern or to give us any feedback please contact me here or post in the elimee designs crochet pattern group on facebook 5 sign-up to receive my weekly newsletter 6 where you ll receive freebies hear about giveaways/sales and be the first to know about new pattern launches for all safety notices and gpsr contact details please visit the blog post linked below this pdf if free from viruses malware and a risk assessment has been carried out 1 https //www elimeedesigns co uk/blog/british-country-garden-blanket-crochet-along-crochet-pattern 2 https //payhip com/b/3vzjq 3 https //www elimeedesigns co uk/blog/british-country-garden-blanket-crochet-along-crochet-pattern 4 https //www woolwarehouse co uk/nichola-griffiths-elimee-designs-british-country-garden-yarnsmiths 5 https //www facebook com/groups/575696026789853 6 https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/183962/69245113411307155/share
